column1: Create a high-end commercial video; precisely analyze the uploaded product image using full visual inspection to identify the exact product type and use-case with zero guessing, then replicate the product 100% exactly in every detail with no deviation; feature a beautiful Thai-Japanese female model whose appearance must match the reference image perfectly; she demonstrates the analyzed product naturally while delivering a script in fluent Bangkok Thai with accurate Thai phoneme mapping, forced precise Thai mouth shapes, and perfect lip-sync; generate a full commercial script that stays within 10 seconds or less (hook ? problem ? transformation ? call-to-action) using short clear Thai phrases optimized for lip-sync accuracy; cinematography in 4K photorealistic studio lighting, clean background, no text or graphics; ensure the product and model remain visually consistent in every frame. No Text, No Caption on Video
